name: RetroCat
description: RetroCat is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vintage retro console box, it brings a nostalgic charm to the world of technology. Its arms and legs are built with sturdy foundry material, enabling it to withstand any challenge that comes its way. The buttons on its console box are uniquely shaped like cats, reflecting its playful nature. The screen of RetroCat emits a powerful laser, providing precise and accurate data visualization. Equipped with these features, RetroCat is a valued member of the WebtrES club, contributing its skills and expertise to the club's endeavors.
